title: Introduce `quarkus.oidc.authentication.add-scopes` property
body:
### Description

We already have  `quarkus.oidc.authentication.scopes` property, whenever OIDC authorization code flow is used, and more scopes should be requested, this property can be used.

For example, with Google, one can have

```
quarkus.oidc.google.authentication.scopes=email,profile
```

The above scopes are setup with `quarkus.oidc.provider=google`, as in:

```
quarkus.oidc.provider=google
quarkus.oidc.client-id=${google-client-id}
quarkus.oidc.credentials.secret=${google-client-secret}
```

This is all good, and any property set up indirectly with `quarkus.oidc.provider=google` can be `overridden` - I'm highlighting it because it is getting inconvenient if one more scope, in addition to `email,profile` (already setup in case of Google) had to be `added`, and not replace/override the existing scopes value.

For example, if I need to support Google Calendar, in addition to `email, profile`, then the only way to do it is:

```
quarkus.oidc.provider=google
quarkus.oidc.client-id=${google-client-id}
quarkus.oidc.credentials.secret=${google-client-secret}
quarkus.oidc.authentication.scopes=email,profile,https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar
```

which is not great - since I have to list `email,profile` again, to avoid them be overridden with the new `quarkus.oidc.authentication.scopes` value.

I'd like to be able to type only:
```
quarkus.oidc.provider=google
quarkus.oidc.client-id=${google-client-id}
quarkus.oidc.credentials.secret=${google-client-secret}
quarkus.oidc.authentication.scopes=https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar
```
but we can't distinguish here if the user means to add this scope to whatever scopes are already supported, not to replace them, thus a new property can help:

```
quarkus.oidc.provider=google
quarkus.oidc.client-id=${google-client-id}
quarkus.oidc.credentials.secret=${google-client-secret}
quarkus.oidc.authentication.add-scopes=https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar
```



### Implementation ideas

Add a new property to let users add scopes to the already configured scopes as opposed to replace them
